title: Facebook sides with the satanic pedo cult
author: VD
content_html:
REPORTER: Mr. Zuckerberg, QAnon believes President Trump is secretly saving the world from a cult of satanic pedophiles. What’s your response to that?

FACEBOOK: Today we are taking action against Facebook Pages, Groups and Instagram accounts tied to offline anarchist groups that support QAnon. As a result of some of the actions we’ve already taken, we’ve removed over 790 groups, 100 Pages and 1,500 ads tied to QAnon from Facebook, blocked over 300 hashtags across Facebook and Instagram, and additionally imposed restrictions on over 1,950 Groups and 440 Pages on Facebook and over 10,000 accounts on Instagram.

Not much question what cult Zuckerbitch belongs to, or whom he serves. Can you even imagine what a complete nonentity like him must have had to do to be put in the position that he has now? His inevitable fall from the high horse promises to be spectacular indeed. No wonder he’s constantly trying to reinvent himself, like Lady Macbeth desperately trying to wash hands that will never be clean.
content_text:
REPORTER:
Mr. Zuckerberg, QAnon believes President Trump is secretly saving the world from a cult of satanic pedophiles. What’s your response to that?
FACEBOOK:
Today we are taking action against Facebook Pages, Groups and Instagram accounts tied to offline anarchist groups that support QAnon. As a result of some of the actions we’ve already taken, we’ve removed over 790 groups, 100 Pages and 1,500 ads tied to QAnon from Facebook, blocked over 300 hashtags across Facebook and Instagram, and additionally imposed restrictions on over 1,950 Groups and 440 Pages on Facebook and over 10,000 accounts on Instagram.
Not much question what cult Zuckerbitch belongs to, or whom he serves. Can you even imagine what a complete nonentity like him must have had to do to be put in the position that he has now? His inevitable fall from the high horse promises to be spectacular indeed. No wonder he’s constantly trying to reinvent himself, like Lady Macbeth desperately trying to wash hands that will never be clean.
